// Keep keys in alphabetical order and b: This provides for quicker lookup of addon information.
author: anaran
description:
Try the Issue Pigeon menu entry after selecting some broken links or text errors.
The Issue Pigeon might just find its way home.

Report issues for supported sites, based on content extracted from text selections in webpage.

Context menu entry on Android is only available on hyperlinks, because text selection is mutually exclusive with a context menu there.
name: issue-pigeon
title: Issue Pigeon
